amendment.description: Amendment allows the Jefferson Pilot Insurance Corporation in North Carolina the option of increasing their broadcast interest in order to maximize the value of their asset divestiture.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 1 printed in H. Rept. 106-214 to provide that a financial holding company that meets all requirements for grandfathering of non-financial activities shall not be subject to expansion limitations with respect to federally regulated communications companies owned by an insurance holding company.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burr amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 189 (Roll no. 268).
